choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for today.
Sure, here's a sample healthy meal plan for you for today:
- Breakfast: Greek yogurt with mixed berries, chia seeds, and honey; whole grain toast with avocado and boiled eggs.
- Snack: Apple slices with almond butter.
- Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and balsamic vinaigrette dressing; whole grain crackers.
- Snack: Carrot sticks with hummus.
- Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted vegetables (broccoli, carrots, sweet potato); quinoa or brown rice.
- Dessert: Fresh fruit salad with honey and lime juice dressing.
Remember to stay hydrated by drinking plenty of water throughout the day. You can adjust portion sizes according to your individual needs and dietary requirements.
